intro:
I'm A Programmer, Lazy Stoner, Portraiture Artist, & Possibly A Reptilian Overlord. 

Follow My Zlog:
http://127.0.0.1:43110/139a4hGEiDwJv4SE8AAf3ECb9AN5Kxkro9

post.body: Completed a sketch today using some of my Pop Pop's fancy paper. I think it came out pretty good.
This place is so quiet, but mynoise.net is there to help me sleep. I'm not being paid to promote them, I'm just a fan.
Just saw the Koala Man pilot. Not half bad.
God this place is so surreal. I never realized how much it's like the Addam's family home without the holiday decor

So I've been catching up with my father's side of the family over these past few days. Apparently we're psychic in some small way.

My aunt can see ghosts, my cousins and I can leave our bodies, and I watched my uncle die from miles away without leaving my bed.  Also I distinctly recall my cousin moving bottles without touching them when she was little.

Aaaaand evidently we're not the only ones who've experienced this shit. Feeling like I'm researching the Men Who Stare At Goats right now.

https://www.cia.gov/library/readingroom/docs/CIA-RDP96-00789R002100180002-8.pdf
https://www.cia.gov/library/readingroom/docs/CIA-RDP96-00788R002000160001-3.pdf

comment.body: @leftside: no prob! LMK what your favorite generator / configuration is lol

@leftside: Thanks and eh. I'm more miffed about how the lips and neck came out. I was trying to portray the creases (she doesn't always drink enough water) and the neck just looks like a 50 year old woman's gizzard.
It's supposed to just look really skinny/defined but yeah :/
What flavor of linux do you use and what web browser?

You okay fren? If you want to talk about it I'm here but like
Whaaaaat if we made a D&D group instead? I'm looking to start an internet-friend campaign if you're interested : )

@Smopro: Okay so in opera what you want to do is open up your downloads widget and you should see the zeronet bundle you downloaded from zeronet.io (a .tar.gz file most likely) so what you want to do is click on that magnifying glass or file folder icon next to it and look for either the extracted folder or the unextracted tarball. Extract the tarball if it's the latter, then navigate to the extracted zerobundle folder. Then click zeronet, data, and then copy the location of the folder you're using or take note of it if copying is unavailable. When you use the git command what you want to do is replace /home/user/ZeroBundle/ZeroNet/data with the location of the data folder I had you write down in the previous step.
@Krixano: Just did. 'S been a long night.
